subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With five first-round draft picks in the past two years, General Manager Sam Presti has been able to create a young nucleus to work toward the grand vision he has for Oklahoma City’s new N.B.A. team.
snippet: With five first-round draft picks in the past two years, General Manager Sam Presti has been able to create a young nucleus to work toward the grand vision he has for Oklahoma City’s new N.B.A. team.
